attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm a single mother of 2 un able to claim any benifits due to the fact the my csa money which ment to go toward my kids clothes/food/nappys is to high.... so when i claim for housing and council tax i was not allowed the full amount off.. I don't work as my youest is 2yrs old... they expect me 2 pay rent, full council tax on top of gas, elec, phone, food, clothing,car, petol, insurance, shcool uniform ect... I want to get help for single mum's who want there kids money to go towards there kids not towards payin bill and still have no money to live on

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
